EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.Boston_Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Analytics Innovation Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Analytics Innovation Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Boston.
Date: Tuesday, 9 May 2017
Time:
8:00am - 9:00am Breakfast 9:30am - 12:15pm Sessions 12:15pm - 1:15pm Lunch 1:15pm - 5:30pm Sessions
Location:
Pivotal Boston Office 255 Main St, Cambridge, MA 02142 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/255+Main+St,+Cambridge,+MA+02142/@42.3626831,-71.087541,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x89e370a5f4efd825:0xc0c5b9cf0dd14f59!8m2!3d42.3626831!4d-71.0853523?hl=en]]>)
Agenda:
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/boston?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PAIR-2017]]>
Parking:
Attendees can use the green garage for parking that has an entrance on Broadway. It is a very short walk to our building, when you exit the garage onto the Main Street side.
If you have any questions, feel free to email Patrick Gillis at pgillis@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pgillis@pivotal.io]]>.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
